text: Mario Più (born Mario Piperno in Livorno, Italy on August 26, 1965) is an Italian professional disc jockey. His 1999 single, "Communication", also known as "The Communication Song", is notable for being mainly constructed from the interference caused on improperly shielded audio equipment when a GSM mobile
